website_summaries.verdict: The perfect kit to add flair to your gift or food table.
pros: Kit includes paper and foil fans, baby girl banner, and multicolored tassels
Paper fans are durable and don’t tear easily
Stunning gold and pink color scheme
Set sits at a low price point
cons: Included double-sided tape is not the best, you may want to use staples

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect but,
customer_reviews.text: This set is perfect to decorate for a sprinkle that I am hosting, I love the colors of everything and it looks great displayed. I am giving it 4 stars instead of 5 for 2 reasons: 1. The fans are put together with double sided tape it seems like and they keep coming undone which is a bit irritating. I'm going to have to staple them so they stay in a circle. 2. The tassel banner takes a bit of work to put together and the string it came with to string through the tassels and hang is very flimsy and broke twice when i was putting it together. Other than that I was very pleased with the order.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great for a birthday party or baby shower!
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Nice quality. I screwed up a couple of glue dots accidentally and some twist ties for the tassels should have been nice but I used my own butcher’s twine. I felt happy with the purchase and got lots of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: IndiaSeattle

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful & affordable
customer_reviews.text: I used this decor for a baby shower. It was absolutely perfect! Only thing I would say is make sure that you give yourself plenty of time to put it together. It does require assembly. Also the round fans kept coming unconnected because the tape/glue was not strong enough. I ended up stapling them together. Beautiful though...& I can use it again for other occasions.
customer_reviews.author: B. Hurley

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy baby shower decorations
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Instead of hanging the paper fans with the string I put 1-2 glue dots in the middle on the backside and that worked great! Very cute and simple.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica L.

customer_reviews.title: Special decorations
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty set of decorations and a good deal for all of the items. We did struggle a bit with some of the assembly but overall I thought they were worth the cost and time to assemble. Unique and pretty!
customer_reviews.author: momofthree

customer_reviews.title: These were cute, but a little hanky.
customer_reviews.text: Decorations were cute but many of them refused to stay together on the sticky side and had to be manually taped together throughout the day. The streamers were gorgeous.
customer_reviews.author: Stari Moralez

customer_reviews.title: Looks even better in person
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by the quality for the listed price.Looks even better in person.Love that the banner is pre-strung and set-up was super quick just gorgeous for my friends shower.Friends thought I purchase from Etsy.Highly recommended .Im really satisfied with the purchase I made thank you so much 🙂 really happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Lina rivas

customer_reviews.title: Easy decor
customer_reviews.text: The fans are pretty and very easy to put together but they are a pain to stick to the wall or together. Push pins are a must if you don’t mind holes in the wall. The baby girl sign is cute.
customer_reviews.author: Hamilton Familia

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: These decorations were perfect for my sister's baby shower. I was able to make two strands of the tassles from the set instead of one and it looked great. The decorations are sturdy and reusable. The banner was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Hk75

customer_reviews.title: Assembly required
customer_reviews.text: I was decorating for my cousin's babyshower and I knew she did NOT want it to look like a pink explosion. These decorations were perfect! These decorations also mix well with other decorations because the multi colors. They also held up outside for hours! My only suggestion would be to add words to the tassel instructions because it took an ER nurse, a chemist, and a high schooler to figure out how many sheets where supposed to make a tassel.
customer_reviews.author: ImpulseShopper700

customer_reviews.title: Not your traditional decoration
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for. Not your traditional baby shower decorations. I had so many compliments. They were so easy to put together and easy to take apart to use again if needed. They looked so pretty in person. I also used the tassels to go in between little clothes on a clothes line as a gift/decoration. It was a hit as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This was a shower gift and the mother and the grandmother loved it! The rest of the guests were ooohing and ahhhing!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Baby Girl Shower - Quality Paper
customer_reviews.text: Don’t hesitate, all items were sturdy. itPerfect for my daughters babyshower. Packed away to use for her 1st birthday too, as the quality was so good for reusing!
customer_reviews.author: Donna J. Heatherly

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: So many compliments!! Assembly is very simple. If your are crafty, you will understand the simplicity of the assembly. Absolutely beuatiful product. If this store had more decorations, I would buy from them.
customer_reviews.author: Erica A.

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: The tassel garland was a little pain to put together but once you figure it out it goes quickly. I think I’d change the cold wire twist ties to black, the gold clashes with the tassel colors but, it’s not a big deal once it’s all put together.
customer_reviews.author: phia299

customer_reviews.title: I purchased these decorations for a baby shower and loved them. So cute and the order was delivered ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these decorations for a baby shower and loved them. So cute and the order was delivered within a couple of days. I would buy from this vendor again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, durable and adorable display!
customer_reviews.text: Great value for money and it was so easy to put together. I got these for my baby shower and everyone thought I had got the decor done professionally. I would highly recommend this product anyone planning a party. Also I have saved it for future use :-)
customer_reviews.author: Lifewithzeenat

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: The tassel was impossible to make so I just tossed it and feel like I got ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: These decorations were high quality and beautiful! They were perfect for the baby shower I held.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy For Office Baby Shower!
customer_reviews.text: This kit was perfect for an office baby shower where they don’t really allow much to be taped or hung. I assembled it all in less than 20 minutes at my desk. Only one fan had trouble staying together with the double stick tape but it was a quick and easy fix with a paper clip. Everyone commented how fun the decorations were. Would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: jill Rankin

customer_reviews.title: Everything you will need for the baby shower in a box!
customer_reviews.text: This product was great for my daughter’s baby shower. Lots of decorations. We didn’t even use all of the products in the kit. Good quality, really pretty. I didn’t realize I needed to put the tassels together, but it was easy and didn’t take a lot of time. Just open the box ahead of time so you know what you have.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Theis

customer_reviews.title: Very fancy payoff
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful colors and design. Momma wants to save them indefinitely!

customer_reviews.title: Very classy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for A baby shower at work. Very classy the mom to be loved them!

customer_reviews.text: So cute! Used these for a baby shower then used most of them for a birthday party. Versatile & I kept to use again!

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful

customer_reviews.text: My sister in law loved the colors and design for her baby shower.

customer_reviews.text: The items were good quality and relatively easy to assemble (it took me a minute to figure out how to put together the string of tassled paper things). The colors and design were beautiful and I saved them to use for another occasion!

customer_reviews.text: The decorations were stunning, absolutely perfect, and easy to install (we used tiny command hooks on the wall). Perfect baby shower decor, and were just as pretty in person. Great quality.

customer_reviews.text: The most gorgeous high quality decorations. A little time consuming to put together but well worth it!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful decor for a baby shower!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful and looked exactly as advertised. The decorations were very easy to put together and included everything needed to assemble.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Worth the price. Items can be reused after party to decorate the baby's room.
customer_reviews.author: Gabe G

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Neat packaging and beautiful decor! Would recommend! Added a beautiful flare to the baby shower.
customer_reviews.author: Lyanne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product! Beautiful colors!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing quality product! Ordered this for my friend's baby shower and everyone loved it! Looked exactly like the picture and was very easy to setup and hang. The colors are very pretty as well and not too loud... love the pinks, corals, metallics. To get the look displayed, I ordered 2 kits and really created a focal wall where the cake was placed. Would definitely order the product again!
customer_reviews.author: Event Planner @ RA

customer_reviews.title: A lot of bang for your buck
customer_reviews.text: These decorations were easy to assemble and were great quality!! I will reorder for my next party!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: I needed baby shower decorations for a co-worker, and after a search I chose this based on the colors in the picture. Everything went smoothly from there: quick delivery, perfectly packaged and upon opening, very easy to set up. The colors were just like the pictures, bright and vibrant. The price is very nice as well, as my other research for decorations were almost twice this cost. I was very pleased with this purchase and would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Luxe Decorations
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two sets of these decorations for an office baby shower. Though we had little time to assemble and decorate the room, it looked lovely! The fans are made of a nice heavy cardstock, substantial but not so heavy that hanging them up was a problem. The tassels were much easier to assemble than similar products I’ve bought in the past and were elegant and pretty. We paired these with pale pink and white striped plates and napkins that were edged in gold foil, and they looked lovely together. I highly recommend this product; well worth the investment if a tasteful, elegant shower is what you have in mind.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: These decorations are so cute! I don't do much set up or decorating so I don't have a lot to compare this to, but the shower was a total success. The items were great quality, packaged nicely, and shipped fast. The decor looked even better in person. I'm so glad I made this purchase. :)
customer_reviews.author: Aria

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: That was the best buy for my daughter's 1st birthday. I was hesitating and bought it. OMG the quality is great, the colors are perfect and the result once hanging is perfect! I tapped the edges instead of using the tape on each fan, then just cut it with a knife blade so I can reuse it at least another time. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Extensive preparation
customer_reviews.text: The fans were great. The tassels were dull and tissue paper. It took a day to assemble them with minimal directions. I reassembled them after the party. The tassels and cord were a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Steve G. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Baby Shower Decorations!
customer_reviews.text: These were just what we were looking for! The Momma liked them so much she took them home to hang in baby's room! They were easy to assemble and looked exactly like the photo.
customer_reviews.author: Sonja D. Lazzeroni

customer_reviews.title: beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful but it took a bit to assemble. This set made a beautiful backdrop for the baby shower. Love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Super Classy
customer_reviews.text: I love this set! I used it for two baby showers this week and received lots of compliments. I love it because it is not your traditional pink and white decor, but has lots of other purples, greens and golds in it. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: VtotheG

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to our shower decorations. Only reason for the 4 stars is because the tassels are very heavy and we couldn't get the to hang on the front of the table. It all worked out.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and great quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these decorations!! They are so pretty and very good quality! Definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.text: I really loved the colors. The fan hangings were Sturdy and can definitely be used again. This was all so easy to put together. I will be ordering for the next baby shower.

product_meta.title: YARA Baby Shower Decorations for Girl Kit|It’s a Girl Pink and Gold Decor|Baby Girl Garland Bunting Banner|Rustic and Princess Theme Party Supplies|Boho|Paper Fans Decoration Neutral|Tassels|Oh Baby
feature_bullets: 🌸FEATURED ON BEST REVIEWS WEBSITE: Our beautiful Baby Shower Party Decorations Kit is featured on the “Best Reviews” website and was chosen “BEST OF THE BEST” for Girl Baby Shower Decoration Set.
🌸PREMIUM QUALITY: Unlike tissue paper fans, our Baby Shower Decor Set includes fans that are made from the highest quality card stock paper with gold foil that’s durable and reusable.

🌸QUICK AND EASY SET UP: Fans come with pre-attached string for easy hanging and is pre-taped so you simply have to peel the film and stick the ends together. Banner is PRE-STRUNG for your convenience, simply unfold and hang. Tassels are easy to assemble, we have included a visual instruction for your convenience. Flower centers come with dot glue, just peel and stick on the fans. PLS NOTE-FANS ARE MADE WITH MEDIUM STRENGTH GLUE SO IT COULD BE REUSED. PAPER CLIPS ARE PROVIDED TO REINFORCEMENT.

🌸VERSATILE USE: This Baby Girl set looks great in various themes! Use for floral, boho, princess, bohemian, butterfly, unicorn, woodland, rainbow or rustic themed backdrops. Pack it up and reuse for baptism decor, baby's first birthday, backdrop for photography or even decorate a colleagues office for a surprise party. Use indoor, outdoor, hang on ceilings, walls, tables, trees and more.
🌸YOUR SATISFACTION IS GUARANTEED: Love your Baby Shower Decor or your money back!
